Sentencas: Nanocrystalline La10Si6O27 apatite-type sample was synthesized by the co-precipitation method.
Titulo: Structural characterization, electrical conductivity and open circuit voltage studies of the nanocrystalline La10Si6O27 electrolyte material for SOFCs

Sentencas: Thermal behavior, phase, structure, morphology and elemental composition of La, O and Si of the synthesized La10Si6O27 sample were investigated through TG/DTA, XRD, FTIR, Raman spectroscopy and SEM-EDX measurements respectively.
Titulo: Structural characterization, electrical conductivity and open circuit voltage studies of the nanocrystalline La10Si6O27 electrolyte material for SOFCs

Sentencas: Formation of phase purity of the nanocrystalline La10Si6O27 sample was confirmed by analysing the measured X-ray powder diffraction (XRD) pattern using Rietveld refinement and the calculated average crystallite size of the La10Si6O27 sample was found to be 33 nm.
Titulo: Structural characterization, electrical conductivity and open circuit voltage studies of the nanocrystalline La10Si6O27 electrolyte material for SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the sintered La10Si6O27 pellet was investigated as a function of temperature ranging from 200 to 800 degrees C under air and it was found to be 1.92 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Structural characterization, electrical conductivity and open circuit voltage studies of the nanocrystalline La10Si6O27 electrolyte material for SOFCs

Sentencas: The chemical stability of La10Si6O27 powder under oxidizing and reducing atmospheres was confirmed from the analysis of the measured XRD pattern and Raman spectral results.
Titulo: Structural characterization, electrical conductivity and open circuit voltage studies of the nanocrystalline La10Si6O27 electrolyte material for SOFCs

Sentencas: Open circuit potential of a button cell, made up of the La10Si6O27 sample, was tested up to 800 degrees C with both oxygen and hydrogen at opposite sides of the cell and was found to similar to 1
Titulo: Structural characterization, electrical conductivity and open circuit voltage studies of the nanocrystalline La10Si6O27 electrolyte material for SOFCs

Sentencas: V. Hence, the results demonstrate that La10Si6O27 could be a promising solid electrolyte material for the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Structural characterization, electrical conductivity and open circuit voltage studies of the nanocrystalline La10Si6O27 electrolyte material for SOFCs
